function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases in residential care facilities","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardised method for covid-19 measurements","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential of human wastewater to track diseases","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reliance on sewage-based monitoring for disease detection","category":"Lack of
